refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the text of the error message from previous MySQL operation

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the error text from the last MySQL function, or '' (the empty string) if no error occurred. If no link is explicitly passed to the function, the last successful open link will be used to retrieve the error message from the MySQL server.
See also mysql_errno and MySQL error messages.
